name: Our Dear Kingdom
detailed_description:
Raise Our Dear Kingdom from a small village to an empire with big castles!

Our Dear Kingdom is a game about gathering resources and manage them in order to grow from a small village to an empire. You will also have to gather food and manage its supply, saving the population from starvation.

Design, build and grow your dream medieval city.

Defend your city from enemies by building impressive walls that will keep the population safe.

Your decisions will shape the future of Our Dear Kingdom!

Some features:
  • Sandbox mode
  • Procedurally generated maps
  • Gather resources
  • Gather food
  • Manage the population
  • Design and grow the city

short_description: Raise Our Dear Kingdom from a small village to an empire with big castles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
